data.title: British Horse Racing Movies
data.meta_description: This is a website dedicated to those British movies which focus on horse racing or at least feature action from one of Britain's racecourses past and present. I have started to build a small collection of related films but the list is by no means exhaustive and I would welcome feedback on any other similar films which could be added to this site.
data.text:
Movies

Please find Below a list of the British movies I have collected so far that either have a horse racing theme or at least feature scenes from one of Britain's racecourses past and present. Click on the "Film Details" link for further information including; synopsis, film links, personal reviews and movie stills. Please be aware that the personal review and movie stills will contain spoilers. The list is by no means complete so if you know of any other British films that focus on horse racing or feature a British racecourse past or present please contact me above and I will be glad to add the film to the list if appropriate.
